description.zh-cn: 澳大利亚记者、行动主义者、程序员及黑客，维基解密创始人、首席编辑与发言人。
description.en: Australian editor, publisher, and activist who founded WikiLeaks. He was also a programmer and hacker.

description.zh-cn: 由朱利安·阿桑奇于2006年创立的揭密网站，专门发布匿名来源和网络泄露的文档。
description.en: A whistle-blowing website founded by Julian Assange in 2006, which publishes news leaks and classified media provided by anonymous sources.

description.zh-cn: 美国活动家和告密者，前美国陆军士兵，因向维基解密泄露机密文件而被定罪。
description.en: American activist and whistleblower. She is a former United States Army soldier who was convicted for disclosing to WikiLeaks classified documents.

description.zh-cn: 对朱利安·阿桑奇及其创办的维基解密进行了长期刑事调查，并寻求将其引渡至美国受审。
description.en: Conducted a long-term criminal investigation into Julian Assange and his organization WikiLeaks, and sought his extradition to the United States for trial.

description.zh-cn: 负责对朱利安·阿桑奇提起刑事诉讼的美国联邦行政部门。
description.en: The U.S. federal executive department responsible for the prosecution of Julian Assange.

description.zh-cn: 瑞典检方曾对阿桑奇提出性侵犯指控，并寻求将其引渡至瑞典进行问话，该调查后被中止。
description.en: Swedish prosecutors filed sexual assault allegations against Assange and sought his extradition for questioning; the investigation was later dropped.

description.zh-cn: 曾向朱利安·阿桑奇提供政治庇护，允许其在其驻英国大使馆居住了近七年。
description.en: Granted political asylum to Julian Assange, allowing him to reside in its embassy in the UK for nearly seven years.

description.zh-cn: 朱利安·阿桑奇于2012年至2019年期间寻求政治庇护的地点。
description.en: The location where Julian Assange sought political asylum from 2012 to 2019.

description.zh-cn: 厄瓜多尔政治家，曾任厄瓜多尔总统。在其任内，厄瓜多尔撤销了对朱利安·阿桑奇的政治庇护。
description.en: Ecuadorian politician who served as the President of Ecuador. During his term, Ecuador revoked Julian Assange's political asylum.

description.zh-cn: 负责执行逮捕朱利安·阿桑奇行动的英国警察机构。
description.en: The UK police force responsible for arresting Julian Assange.

description.zh-cn: 美国联邦法律，美国政府据此对朱利安·阿桑奇提出多项指控。
description.en: A United States federal law under which the U.S. government brought multiple charges against Julian Assange.

description.zh-cn: 律师，朱利安·阿桑奇的妻子。
description.en: A lawyer and the wife of Julian Assange.

description.zh-cn: 朱利安·阿桑奇的生父，反战活动家和建筑师。
description.en: Julian Assange's biological father, an anti-war activist and builder.

description.zh-cn: 朱利安·阿桑奇的母亲，视觉艺术家。
description.en: Julian Assange's mother, a visual artist.

description.zh-cn: 朱利安·阿桑奇的儿子。
description.en: Son of Julian Assange.

description.zh-cn: 美国主要情报机构之一。据报道，在中情局文件泄露事件后，该机构曾密谋从厄瓜多尔伦敦大使馆绑架阿桑奇，并讨论了暗杀他的可能性。
description.en: One of the principal intelligence agencies of the United States. Following the Vault 7 leaks, the agency reportedly plotted to kidnap Assange from the Ecuadorian embassy in London and discussed his possible assassination.

description.zh-cn: 美国政治家，曾任中央情报局局长和美国国务卿。他称维基解密为“非国家敌对情报机构”。
description.en: American politician who served as Director of the Central Intelligence Agency and U.S. Secretary of State. He called WikiLeaks a 'non-state hostile intelligence service'.

description.zh-cn: 位于伦敦的最高安全级别监狱，朱利安·阿桑奇自2019年4月被捕后一直被关押于此，直至2024年6月获释。
description.en: A high-security prison in London where Julian Assange was held from his arrest in April 2019 until his release in June 2024.

description.zh-cn: 澳大利亚的一所公立研究型大学，朱利安·阿桑奇曾在此学习物理与数学。
description.en: A public research university in Australia where Julian Assange studied physics and mathematics.

description.zh-cn: 朱利安·阿桑奇于2006年创建了揭密网站维基解密，并担任其首席编辑与发言人。
description.en: Julian Assange founded the whistle-blowing website WikiLeaks in 2006 and served as its editor-in-chief and spokesperson.

description.zh-cn: 朱利安·阿桑奇是维基解密的核心人物，担任首席编辑与主要发言人。
description.en: Julian Assange is the central figure of WikiLeaks, serving as its editor-in-chief and primary spokesperson.

description.zh-cn: 2010年，时任美国陆军情报分析员的切尔西·曼宁向维基解密提供了一系列机密文件，引发国际关注。
description.en: In 2010, Chelsea Manning, then a U.S. Army intelligence analyst, provided a series of classified documents to WikiLeaks, sparking international attention.

description.zh-cn: 在维基解密公布机密文件后，美国政府对阿桑奇展开了长期的刑事调查，并以违反《间谍法》等多项罪名起诉他，寻求将其引渡至美国。
description.en: After WikiLeaks published classified documents, the U.S. government launched a long-term criminal investigation against Assange, indicting him on multiple charges including violations of the Espionage Act and seeking his extradition.

description.zh-cn: 瑞典检方以涉嫌性犯罪为由对阿桑奇展开调查并寻求引渡，该调查最终于2019年11月中止。
description.en: Swedish prosecutors initiated an investigation and sought the extradition of Assange on allegations of sexual offenses, an investigation that was ultimately dropped in November 2019.

description.zh-cn: 为避免被引渡，朱利安·阿桑奇于2012年6月19日进入厄瓜多尔驻英国大使馆寻求政治庇护，并在其中居住了近七年，直至2019年4月11日被捕。
description.en: To avoid extradition, Julian Assange entered the Embassy of Ecuador in the UK on June 19, 2012, seeking political asylum. He resided there for nearly seven years until his arrest on April 11, 2019.

description.zh-cn: 时任厄瓜多尔总统利宁·莫雷诺以阿桑奇违反庇护条款为由，撤销了对他的政治庇护，并允许英国警方进入大使馆将其逮捕。
description.en: Then-President of Ecuador, Lenín Moreno, revoked Assange's political asylum, citing violations of his asylum conditions, and permitted British police to enter the embassy to arrest him.

description.zh-cn: 在厄瓜多尔政府撤销庇护后，伦敦警察厅于2019年4月11日进入厄瓜多尔大使馆逮捕了朱利安·阿桑奇。
description.en: After the Ecuadorian government revoked his asylum, the Metropolitan Police entered the Ecuadorian embassy on April 11, 2019, and arrested Julian Assange.

description.zh-cn: 朱利安·阿桑奇被捕后，因违反保释条例被判刑，并随后因引渡案被持续关押在贝尔马什监狱，直至2024年6月达成认罪协议后获释。
description.en: Following his arrest, Julian Assange was sentenced for breaching bail conditions and was subsequently held at Belmarsh Prison pending extradition proceedings until his release in June 2024 after reaching a plea deal.

description.zh-cn: 2024年6月24日，朱利安·阿桑奇与美国司法部达成认罪协议，承认一项违反《间谍法》的罪名，以换取自由并返回澳大利亚。
description.en: On June 24, 2024, Julian Assange reached a plea deal with the U.S. Department of Justice, pleading guilty to one charge under the Espionage Act in exchange for his freedom and return to Australia.

description.zh-cn: 朱利安·阿桑奇与他的律师史黛拉·亚桑杰于2015年开始交往，并于2022年3月23日在贝尔马什监狱结婚。他们育有两个儿子。
description.en: Julian Assange began a relationship with his lawyer, Stella, in 2015, and they married in Belmarsh Prison on March 23, 2022. They have two sons together.

description.zh-cn: 约翰·希普顿是朱利安·阿桑奇的生父。
description.en: John Shipton is the biological father of Julian Assange.

description.zh-cn: 克丽斯廷·安·霍金斯是朱利安·阿桑奇的母亲。
description.en: Christine Ann Hawkins is the mother of Julian Assange.

description.zh-cn: 丹尼尔·阿桑奇是朱利安·阿桑奇的儿子。
description.en: Daniel Assange is the son of Julian Assange.

description.zh-cn: 据雅虎新闻报道，在维基解密发布“七号保险库”文件后，时任中情局局长迈克·蓬佩奥领导下的中情局曾讨论绑架甚至暗杀在厄瓜多尔大使馆的阿桑奇。
description.en: According to Yahoo News, after WikiLeaks published the 'Vault 7' documents, the CIA, under then-Director Mike Pompeo, discussed kidnapping and even assassinating Assange while he was in the Ecuadorian embassy.

description.zh-cn: 美国政府利用《1917年间谍法》对朱利安·阿桑奇提出多项刑事指控。
description.en: The U.S. government used the Espionage Act of 1917 to bring multiple criminal charges against Julian Assange.

description.zh-cn: 2003年至2006年间，朱利安·阿桑奇在墨尔本大学学习物理与数学，但未完成学位。
description.en: From 2003 to 2006, Julian Assange studied physics and mathematics at the University of Melbourne but did not complete his degree.
